verses.roman:
rāmānanda kahe,--prabhu, tomāra ājñā pāñā
rājāke likhiluṅ āmi vinaya kariyā

synonyms: rāmānanda kahe—Rāmānanda Rāya said; prabhu—my dear Lord; tomāra ājñā—Your permission; pāñā—getting; rājāke likhiluṅ—have written a letter to the King; āmi—I; vinaya kariyā—with great humility.
translation: Rāmānanda Rāya said, "My dear Lord, with Your permission I have already written a letter to the King with great humility.
